Review_Text: SpoilerThis incredible documentary drama, by a great director, is definitely a highlight, and indeed a great showcase from a film festival.The film features some poignang and interesting issues of humanity indeed, very well written and paced, eye-opening indeed and rather well composed overall in a very human and to all relatable drama.The cinematography, cutting and editing is incredible, very feature worthy, and indeed a rather beautifully put together and career defining endevour.Overall, definitely an interesting and very well made film, that I would indeed recommended that you give a watch!
